thread.title: Hillary Clinton slams Trump in front of his casino
thread.title_full: Hillary Clinton slams Trump in front of his casino - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Hillary Clinton slams Trump in front of his casino
text:
By NICHOLAS RICCARDI
Associated Press LAS VEGAS (AP) - Hillary Rodham Clinton has been mocking Republican presidential front-runner Donald Trump on his own doorstep.
Clinton spoke at a labor rally Monday night in front of the Trump International Hotel in Las Vegas. The influential Culinary Workers Union, which is trying to organize hotel employees, invited all the candidates in town for Tuesday's Democratic presidential debate to the event.
Clinton says Trump isn't funny when he insults immigrants and women. She says he needs to represent all people if he wants to be president of the United States.
